parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns object's heading in the range from 0 to 360 in render time scope.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getDirVisual''' object

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Render Time Scope

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>_dir = '''getDirVisual''' [[player]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getDir]], [[direction]]
</value></part></template></root>
